title: JavaScript Developer
text: Learning the JavaScript language and the React library for front-end development. On the backend, using Node.js coupled with the Express.js framework. Creating multiple group projects using these technologies. Worth noting: learning and using the Three.js library and React Three Fiber (3D) for the Apollo project.

title: Information systems manager
text: Within an industrial IT team, I successfully carried out several infrastructure projects, system administration on Linux and Windows, and security tasks while providing user support. Worth noting: administration and project management on the SAP ERP, specifically focusing on the BC, PP, and QM modules.

title: Administrateur de bases de données
text: Providing Level 2 support for Oracle and SQL Server. Performing, monitoring, and controlling backups and failovers. 24/7 on-call duty for production servers. Installing SQL Server and Oracle servers on Windows and Linux environments. Worth noting: Implementation of an Oracle Grid Control server.
